message: I loved the concept of this non techie show but it's been a long time since an episode. Is it finished.  I kept wanting to see more food talk than things like bubble gum, cotton candy, etc. Would have loved to have heard more in-depth talk about coffee, bread, veggies, soup and more of foods from a regular meal.
Yea that would be nice but I don't think TWiT is going that direction.
I could see them do something similiar to Lifehacker's new revision 3 podcast
Leo is doing muchcast between the shows ;) And I see Tom has started to eat online as well, and sometimes Sarah, its the eating network! *g*
